text: Willi Sitte (28 February 1921 â€“ 8 June 2013) was a German painter. For a long time, he was the president of the East German association of visual artists. Sitte was born on 28 February 1921 in Kratzau, Bohemia, Czechoslovakia to German parents. He was never married and had no children. Sitte died on 8 June 2013 in Halle, Germany from natural causes, aged 92. == References == == Other websites == * * Entry for Willi Sitte on the Union List of Artist Names * European Academy of Humanities * Willi Sitte , official site Category:1921 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Czechoslovak people Category:German painters
title: Willi Sitte
